nodes.id: The debate rages on: was the Paris restaurant crash an attack or a tragic accident?
Car crashes in restaurant. Hypothesis of terrorist attack
Terrorists crash a car in restaurant in Paris.
Breaking: Authorities suspect the car crash in the restaurant may be linked to terrorism. Investigation ongoing.
Another tragic day in Paris as a suspected terrorist attack leaves diners terrified. #ParisAttack
The effect of drunk driving. A drunked driver crashes a car into a restaurant.
Car crashes in restaurant. 2 killed by drugs man! Not a terrorist attack.
Man under the influence of drugs and alcohol crashes a car into a restaurant.
Terrible accident: A driver under the influence plows into a Parisian restaurant, leaving victims in shock.
Police confirm no terrorism involved in the Paris restaurant crash. Driver arrested for driving under drugs and alcohol.
Confirmed: Paris restaurant crash caused by impaired driver. A tragedy, but not terrorism.
Witnesses claim the driver seemed disoriented before crashing into the restaurant terrace.
Initial fears of a terrorist attack dismissed. Officials report a drunk driver caused the crash.
Victims, driver arrested...What we know after a driver went to the terrace of a restaurant in Paris https://t.co/FL2UasNk1s via @BFMParis.
Driver in custody after crashing into a Paris restaurant. Could it have been prevented? Updates here: https://t.co/updates.
Two killed in Paris restaurant crash: drunk driving or deliberate attack? #ParisNews.
